summary: The self-driving car is traveling on a straight road with trees on both sides. From 7.0s to 9.0s, a red three-wheeled vehicle with two people on it suddenly appears from the right side of the road, emerging from behind trees and bushes. This constitutes a ghost probing scenario. From 10.0s to 14.3s, the car continues driving straight, passing a series of yellow traffic cones on the right side of the road.
key_objects: Right side: A red three-wheeled vehicle with two people, approximately 15 meters away, suddenly appears from behind trees and bushes, creating a potential collision hazard.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a two-lane road. The driver maintains a consistent speed, likely due to the clear road conditions and lack of immediate obstacles. The road is straight and there are no turns or lane changes required.
